modal_title: Details of the Job Not Approved
submission_successful: Submission successful! Please wait for the system's approval result.
service_description_guideline: Please visually describe your job, including the services you provide such as design, translation, printing, consulting, etc. If you have sample products, you can explain and attach images to the service profile. However, using images as the job title or service description may lead clients to think that you only accept that specific job.
upload_guideline: Please upload at least 3 product images related to your job category, ensuring they are not duplicates. This helps your profile demonstrate diversity.
